pli-tv-kd13:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd13:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.1.4: “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.1.7: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.3: Tena, bhikkhave, udāyinā bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.4: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.5: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṃghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.6: Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.7: Dutiyampi, sohaṃ, bhante, saṃghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.8: Ahaṃ, bhante, ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.2.9: Tatiyampi sohaṃ, bhante, saṃghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.3: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.4: So saṃghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.5: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.8: Ayaṃ udāyī bhikkhu ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajji sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.9: So saṃghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:1.3.10: Saṃgho udāyissa bhikkhuno ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:20.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpanno hoti—
pli-tv-kd13:20.1.2: ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti dvīhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti tīhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti catūhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti pañcāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti chāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti sattāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti aṭṭhāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti navāhappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā.
pli-tv-kd13:20.1.9: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho tassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.7: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.12: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji—
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.15: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.16: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.19: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji—
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.22: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.23: Saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.24: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā;
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.25: tassā agghena samodhānaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.29: Dinno saṃghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpatti dasāhappaṭicchannā tassā agghena samodhānaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:20.2.30: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:21.1.28: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyo tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:22.2.16: ‘yannūnāhaṃ saṃghaṃ itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho tassa bhikkhuno itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:22.3.3: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā, vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā, ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā, añjaliṃ paggahetvā, evamassa vacanīyo—

pli-tv-kd13:22.3.7: Yannūnāhaṃ saṃghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāceyyan”ti.

pli-tv-kd13:22.4.39: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:22.4.43: Dinno saṃghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno itarissāpi āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāso.

pli-tv-kd13:23.3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.2: ekāya āpattiyā nibbematiko, ekāya āpattiyā vematiko.
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.3: So saṃghaṃ yāya āpattiyā nibbematiko, tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.4: Tassa saṃgho tassā āpattiyā dvemāsappaṭicchannāya dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.4.5: So parivasanto itarissāpi āpattiyā nibbematiko hoti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.4.8: ekāya āpattiyā nibbematiko, ekāya āpattiyā vematiko.

pli-tv-kd13:23.5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.2: ekā āpatti jānappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti ajānappaṭicchannā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.3: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.4: Tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.5: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.10: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.11: ekā āpatti jānappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti ajānappaṭicchannā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.12: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.13: Tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.14: Tāyo ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu āpanno, tāsāyaṃ bhikkhu parivasatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.16: ‘yāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti jānappaṭicchannā, dhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:23.5.18: Yā ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti ajānappaṭicchannā, adhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.2: ekā āpatti saramānappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti assaramānappaṭicchannā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.3: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.4: Tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.26: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.31: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.32: ekā āpatti nibbematikappaṭicchannā, ekā āpatti vematikappaṭicchannā.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.33: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:23.6.34: Tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.

pli-tv-kd13:23.6.40: Yā ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, āpatti vematikappaṭicchannā adhammikaṃ tassā āpattiyā parivāsadānaṃ;

pli-tv-kd13:25.2.39: Sohaṃ saṃghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ nibbematiko taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāciṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.40: Tassa me saṃgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchānnānaṃ yaṃ māsaṃ nibbematiko taṃ māsaṃ parivāsaṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.42: Yannūnāhaṃ saṃghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yāceyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.43: So saṃghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.44: Tassa saṃgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.2.45: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā purimaṃ upādāya dve māsā parivasitabbā.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.2: eko māso jānappaṭicchanno, eko māso ajānappaṭicchanno.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.3: So saṃghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.4: Tassa saṃgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.5: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.10: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.11: Eko māso jānappaṭicchanno, eko māso ajānappaṭicchanno.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.12: So saṃghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.13: Tassa saṃgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.14: Tāyo ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu āpanno tāsāyaṃ bhikkhu parivasatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.16: ‘yvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso jānappaṭicchanno dhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.18: Yo ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso ajānappaṭicchanno adhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.21: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.22: eko māso saramānappaṭicchanno, eko māso assaramānappaṭicchanno.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.23: So saṃghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.24: Tassa saṃgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.25: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.30: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.31: eko māso saramānappaṭicchanno, eko māso assaramānappaṭicchanno.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.32: So saṃghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.33: Tassa saṃgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.34: Tāyo ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu āpanno tāsāyaṃ bhikkhu parivasatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.36: ‘yvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso saramānappaṭicchanno dhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.38: Yo ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso assaramānappaṭicchanno adhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.41: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.42: eko māso nibbematikappaṭicchanno, eko māso vematikappaṭicchanno.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.43: So saṃghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.44: Tassa saṃgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.45: Tassa parivasantassa añño bhikkhu āgacchati bahussuto āgatāgamo dhammadharo vinayadharo mātikādharo paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.50: ‘ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu dve saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji dvemāsappaṭicchannāyo;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.51: eko māso nibbematikappaṭicchanno, eko māso vematikappaṭicchanno.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.52: So saṃghaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.53: Tassa saṃgho dvinnaṃ āpattīnaṃ dvemāsappaṭicchannānaṃ dvemāsaparivāsaṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.54: Tāyo ayaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu āpanno tāsāyaṃ bhikkhu parivasatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.56: ‘yvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso nibbematikappaṭicchanno dhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:25.3.58: Yo ca khvāyaṃ, āvuso, māso vematikappaṭicchanno adhammikaṃ tassa māsassa parivāsadānaṃ;
pli-tv-kd13:26.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:26.1.8: āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi;
pli-tv-kd13:26.1.13: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, saṃgho tassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ detu.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.5: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāmi;
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.8: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.13: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.14: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.17: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.18: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.21: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.22: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.25: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.26: Saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.27: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.31: Dinno saṃghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāso.
pli-tv-kd13:26.2.32: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.2: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.10: Āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.11: āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ sarati, ekaccaṃ nassarati, rattipariyantaṃ nassarati;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.12: āpattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko, rattipariyante vematiko—
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.14: Āpattipariyantaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.15: āpattipariyantaṃ nassarati, rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ sarati, ekaccaṃ nassarati;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.16: āpattipariyante vematiko, rattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko—
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.18: Āpattipariyantaṃ jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.19: āpattipariyantaṃ sarati, rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ sarati, ekaccaṃ nassarati;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.20: āpattipariyante nibbematiko, rattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko—
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.22: Āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.3.23: rattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.4.10: Āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ jānāti, ekaccaṃ na jānāti, rattipariyantaṃ jānāti;
pli-tv-kd13:26.4.11: āpattipariyantaṃ ekaccaṃ sarati, ekaccaṃ nassarati, rattipariyantaṃ sarati;
pli-tv-kd13:26.4.12: āpattipariyante ekacce vematiko, ekacce nibbematiko, rattipariyante nibbematiko—
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu parivasanto vibbhami.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.2: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.6: So ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.7: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. (1)
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.8: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto sāmaṇero hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.10: So ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.11: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. (2)
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.12: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto ummattako hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.14: So ce puna anummattako hoti, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.15: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. (3)
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.16: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto khittacitto hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.18: So ce puna akhittacitto hoti, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.19: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. (4)
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.20: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto vedanāṭṭo hoti.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.22: So ce puna avedanāṭṭo hoti, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.23: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. (5)
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.24: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto, āpattiyā adassane, ukkhipiyyati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.26: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.27: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. (6)
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.28: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto, āpattiyā appaṭikamme, ukkhipiyyati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.30: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.31: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. (7)
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.32: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto, pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā, appaṭinissagge, ukkhipiyyati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.34: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.1.35: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho, avaseso parivasitabbo. (8)
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.3: So ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.4: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho.
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho sāmaṇero hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.14: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.2.15: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho.
pli-tv-kd13:27.3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mānattāraho vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.3.3: So ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.3.4: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho.
pli-tv-kd13:27.3.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mānattāraho sāmaṇero hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:27.3.14: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.3.15: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho.
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mānattaṃ caranto vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.3: So ce puna upasampajjati tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.4: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho;
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.5: yaṃ mānattaṃ dinnaṃ sudinnaṃ, yaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇaṃ suciṇṇaṃ, avasesaṃ caritabbaṃ. (25)
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mānattaṃ caranto sāmaṇero hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.14: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.15: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo purivuttho suparivuttho;
pli-tv-kd13:27.4.16: yaṃ mānattaṃ dinnaṃ sudinnaṃ, yaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇaṃ suciṇṇaṃ, avasesaṃ caritabbaṃ. (32)
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbhānāraho vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.3: So ce puna upasampajjati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.4: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho;
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.5: yaṃ mānattaṃ dinnaṃ sudinnaṃ, yaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇaṃ suciṇṇaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbhānāraho sāmaṇero hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.15: So ce puna osāriyyati, tassa tadeva purimaṃ parivāsadānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.16: Yo parivāso dinno sudinno, yo parivuttho suparivuttho;
pli-tv-kd13:27.5.17: yaṃ mānattaṃ dinnaṃ sudinnaṃ, yaṃ mānattaṃ ciṇṇaṃ suciṇṇaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā appaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.3: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā paṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.5: Yathāpaṭicchannānañcassa āpattīnaṃ purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo. (2)
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā paṭicchannāyopi appaṭicchannāyopi.
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.8: Yathāpaṭicchannānañcassa āpattīnaṃ purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo. (3)
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.9: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati aparimāṇā appaṭicchannāyo …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:28.1.16: Yathāpaṭicchannānañcassa āpattīnaṃ purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo. (9)
pli-tv-kd13:28.2.4: abbhānāraho antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā, āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇā appaṭicchannāyo …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:28.2.14: Yathāpaṭicchannānañcassa āpattīnaṃ purimāya āpattiyā samodhānaparivāso dātabbo. (36)
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjitvā appaṭicchādetvā vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.2: So puna upasampanno tā āpattiyo nacchādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjitvā appaṭicchādetvā vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.5: So puna upasampanno tā āpattiyo chādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.6: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pacchimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe yathāpaṭicchanne parivāsaṃ datvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (2)
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjitvā paṭicchādetvā vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.8: So puna upasampanno tā āpattiyo nacchādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:29.1.9: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe yathāpaṭicchanne parivāsaṃ datvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (3)

pli-tv-kd13:34.1.5: Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (1)
pli-tv-kd13:34.1.10: Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (2)
pli-tv-kd13:34.1.15: Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (3)
pli-tv-kd13:34.1.20: Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (4)
pli-tv-kd13:34.1.25: Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (5)
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.3: Ekassa hoti ārocessāmīti, ekassa hoti na ārocessāmīti.
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.4: So paṭhamampi yāmaṃ chādeti, dutiyampi yāmaṃ chādeti, tatiyampi yāmaṃ chādeti—
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.7: Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (8)
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.11: Ekassa antarāmagge makkhadhammo uppajjati na ārocessāmīti.
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.12: So paṭhamampi yāmaṃ chādeti, dutiyampi yāmaṃ chādeti, tatiyampi yāmaṃ chādeti—
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.15: Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (9)
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.19: Te pacchā anummattakā hutvā eko chādeti, eko nacchādeti.
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.21: Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (10)
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.25: ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:34.2.29: Yathāpaṭicchanne cassa parivāsaṃ datvā ubhinnampi mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ. (11)
pli-tv-kd13:35.1.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampi aparimāṇampi, ekanāmampi nānānāmampi, sabhāgampi visabhāgampi, vavatthitampi sambhinnampi.
pli-tv-kd13:35.1.2: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:35.1.3: Tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd13:35.1.4: So parivasanto antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇāyo appaṭicchannāyo.
pli-tv-kd13:35.1.6: Taṃ saṃgho antarāāpattīnaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti;
pli-tv-kd13:35.1.8: So, bhikkhave, bhikkhu avisuddho tāhi āpattīhi. (1)
pli-tv-kd13:35.1.9: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampi aparimāṇampi, ekanāmampi nānānāmampi, sabhāgampi visabhāgampi, vavatthitampi sambhinnampi.
pli-tv-kd13:35.1.10: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.

pli-tv-kd13:36.2.67: Sohaṃ parivasāmīti maññamāno antarā sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ parimāṇā paṭicchannāyopi appaṭicchannāyopi.
pli-tv-kd13:36.2.68: Sohaṃ tasmiṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito purimāāpattīnaṃ antarāāpattiyo sarāmi, aparāāpattīnaṃ antarāāpattiyo sarāmi.
pli-tv-kd13:36.2.69: Yannūnāhaṃ saṃghaṃ purimāāpattīnaṃ antarāāpattīnañca, aparāāpattīnaṃ antarāāpattīnañca, mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāceyyaṃ dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ, dhammena mānattaṃ, dhammena abbhānan’ti.
pli-tv-kd13:36.2.70: So saṃghaṃ purimāāpattīnaṃ antarāāpattīnañca, aparāāpattīnaṃ antarāāpattīnañca, mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ, dhammena mānattaṃ, dhammena abbhānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:36.2.71: Taṃ saṃgho purimāāpattīnaṃ antarāāpattīnañca, aparāāpattīnaṃ antarāāpattīnañca, mūlāya paṭikassati dhammikena kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena, dhammena samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti, dhammena mānattaṃ deti, dhammena abbheti.
pli-tv-kd13:36.2.72: So, bhikkhave, bhikkhu visuddho tāhi āpattīhi. (3)
pli-tv-kd13:36.3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sambahulā saṃghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjati parimāṇampi aparimāṇampi …pe…
pli-tv-kd13:36.3.3: So saṃghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd13:36.3.4: Tassa saṃgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti.
